title: Startup Runway Calculator
subtitle: Estimate how long your startup can operate with current runway and burn rate.
paragraphs: Enter your monthly burn, runway savings, and revenue projections to estimate how many months your startup can continue operating before needing additional funding.
This is a simple planning tool and should be used alongside detailed financial modeling.

faqs.a: Runway is the number of months your startup can operate before funds run out at the current burn rate.
Yes â€” adjust revenue projections and expenses to see updated runway estimates.
